text:
Hundreds gathered near Lighthouse Beach in Evanston today, days after a Confederate flag beach towel was seen there in a viral video.

“I have asked you all to come here today to make racist people uncomfortable,” speaker LaShandra Smith-Rayfield said. https://t.co/pxMkYLySM3

text: The first two COVID-19 patients in the U.S. to undergo a double lung transplant spoke publicly about their experiences today at Northwestern. Here's what they had to say. https://t.co/Ic6gl18UGO
